main event: A report from Project Blue Book documenting a sighting of a satellite-like object observed traveling from south to north on June 30, 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as brilliant and fast, resembling a first magnitude star,The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes,The object was reported to be traveling at a high speed between 30 to 40 km/hour,There is no confirmation if the object was a satellite as echo schedules were unavailable,The sighting was documented in an unclassified message from the Department of the Air Force.
